item.title: How can i make a npc say something i need the code please
item.dc:creator: @wc_pure_rox wc pure rox
item.description:
@wc_pure_rox wrote:

hey montalvom… y dont u make ::hide and ::show for admins only? ;D

add this

&& playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Your name”))

that way only u can do ::hide…

so it will look like this

if (command.startsWith(“hide”) && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Your name”))

if u still want it here it is…

open npchandler.java

search for moo and add this at the last }

if (npcs[i].npcType == you npc id here!) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “type ::show or you will be banned!!!”;
}
}
